p: The mean TMRCA of PVY found by the Bayesian analyses was used as a datum to interpolate the dates of other nodes in the 162 ORF ML tree using patristic distances ( Fourment and Gibbs 2006). Fig.Â 4 shows the nodes that were significantly supported (>0.99 SH), and their dates as calculated arithmetically from the TMRCA; relative dates were obtained from the ratios of the mean pairwise patristic distances of all sequences (i.e. tips) connected through individual nodes.
